name: The North Face Everyday High Rise Pants - Women's
description: Comfort from gym to grocery store. Breathable and stretchy, the Everyday Pants are made with flatlock seams that move with you. The relaxed fit with wider leg openings is great for running errands or running around the block.Made with polyester and Lycra that stretches for any activity.FlashDry™ fabric moves moisture away from skin for quick evaporation.High-rise contoured waistband is higher at the back for added coverage.Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear.2 zippered side pockets secure keys, phone and other small items.
